ðŸ“– Summary: Wicketkeeper is a privacy-focused CAPTCHA system that uses Proof-of-Work to protect web forms from bots. It replaces traditional visual puzzles with a computational challenge, making it easier for users while remaining costly for bots. The system includes a Go backend, a JavaScript client widget, and a full-stack demo application, offering a configurable and containerized solution for bot prevention.
